sourcing.instructions: Arsenic Trioxide - Obtain from chemical suppliers or specialized online retailers (ensure compliance with safety regulations).
steps: Arsenic Trioxide - Obtain from chemical suppliers or specialized online retailers (ensure compliance with safety regulations).
1. In a clean, dry mixing container, combine the Arsenic Trioxide, Barium Carbonate, Cobalt(II) Oxide, Iron(III) Oxide, and Potassium Carbonate.
preparation.raw_text: 1. In a clean, dry mixing container, combine the Arsenic Trioxide, Barium Carbonate, Cobalt(II) Oxide, Iron(III) Oxide, and Potassium Carbonate.

steps: 1. After 2 hours, turn off the furnace and allow it to cool to room temperature naturally.
cooling.raw_text: 1. After 2 hours, turn off the furnace and allow it to cool to room temperature naturally.

steps: 1. Remove any excess material from the sample using a fine-grit sandpaper to achieve a smooth finish.
post_processing.raw_text: 1. Remove any excess material from the sample using a fine-grit sandpaper to achieve a smooth finish.
